summary.headline: Senior FinTech Engineering Executive with 20+ years building scalable financial platforms and leading global teams. Proven expertise in blockchain technology, DeFi protocols, payment systems, and regulatory compliance including GDPR, PCI DSS, and SOX. Track record of managing $100M+ digital assets and scaling engineering teams across multiple countries with performance-driven architecture.
bullets: Engineering Leadership & Management: Built and scaled high-performance teams of 20+ engineers across 3 countries with mentoring and agile coaching
FinTech Expertise: Architected payment systems, DeFi protocols, and trading platforms managing $100M+ assets
Full-Stack Development: Delivered 7+ enterprise applications using modern tech stack (React, .NET Core, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript) with RESTful API architecture
Blockchain & DeFi: Led wrapped token projects, yield strategies, Layer 2 solutions, and integration with major DeFi protocols including Chainlink oracles and TVL optimization

achievements.text: Led wrapped token projects including cxBTC with $100M TVL, implementing DeFi yield strategies on Ethereum and Polygon networks
Scaled three international development teams from 15 to 24 engineers across US, Serbia, and Romania with agile leadership, mentoring, and performance management
Orchestrated cross-functional collaboration to launch wrapped token projects with Chainlink proof-of-reserve oracles for regulatory compliance including AML, KYC, and financial regulations
Integrated MetaMask with Celsius wallet, improving user experience for DeFi interactions and increasing user engagement
Built FireBlocks API clients to audit 5M+ customer vaults across 20+ EVM networks, recovering $4M+ in unsupported assets with high-performance systems architecture
Migrated platform to Django REST Framework, ReactJS, PostgreSQL on AWS with GCP integration, doubling system performance and reducing operational costs through scalable architecture
Integrated payment systems using Stripe & Plaid APIs for credit card & ACH processing with PCI DSS compliance, reducing manual support workload by 60%
Implemented Scrum/agile practices and CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, accelerating release cadence to weekly deployments and improving development processes
Developed first Ethereum NFT product paying crypto for real-world music royalties (ASCAP/BMI), pioneering Web3 royalty payments
Built and led technology team of 12+ developers, designers, QA, and product experts across full software development lifecycle with agile management and mentoring
Engineered $3M social media analytics platform with 1M+ data points daily using Python and JavaScript, open-sourced and presented at national conferences
Implemented domain-driven design architecture using Bootstrap, HTML5, JavaScript ES6, Webpack, and React for scalable applications
Deployed RESTful APIs using ASP.NET Core across Windows and Linux platforms in AWS with 99.9% uptime, implementing high-performance architecture and authentication systems
Led agile teams of 8+ developers creating web and mobile applications using .NET/C#, JavaScript, ReactJS, SQL Server for global markets with leadership and architectural design
Implemented Scrum methodology, continuous integration, Git workflows, and code review practices, improving code quality by 40%
Built and launched 3 web applications and 2 mobile apps for internal and external customers, serving 100K+ users
Led migration from on-premise datacenter to Amazon Web Services cloud platform with PostgreSQL and MySQL databases, reducing infrastructure costs by 35%
First developer on Match.com mobile division, building iOS and Palm webOS applications that reached 1M+ downloads
Built secure mobile APIs (C#/.NET/SQL Server) for iPhone, Windows Phone, and Android platforms with OAuth 2.0 authentication
Developed scalable SMS notification platform reaching 12+ million Match.com users with 99.5% delivery rate

projects.name: CelsiusX Wrapped Bitcoin (cxBTC)
projects.description: Wrapped Bitcoin asset on Polygon with institutional-grade security
achievements: Architected $100M TVL wrapped Bitcoin asset bridging CeFi and DeFi ecosystems
Integrated Chainlink Proof of Reserve for transparency and security
Built real-time, fee-free conversion between native and wrapped assets

projects.name: JellyFish Insights Analytics Platform
projects.description: Open-source social media analytics for non-profits
achievements: Built multi-platform social media analytics tool processing 1M+ data points daily
Developed custom BI features with data ownership and advanced reporting capabilities
Presented at national conferences showcasing innovative data aggregation techniques

projects.name: Match.com Mobile Ecosystem
projects.description: Mobile API architecture and apps for dating platform
achievements: Designed Match.com's mobile API architecture for iOS, Android, WebOS, and Windows Phone
Built SMS system reaching 12M+ users for engagement and retention campaigns
Optimized API performance and caching, improving app response times by 5x+

education.description: Python programming, research design, data modeling, machine learning
